title: 2026 FIFA World Cup schedule at MetLife Stadium for New York-New Jersey matches
description: The 2026 FIFA World Cup schedule at MetLife Stadium.

title: Evening World Cup kick-offs for England, but Scotland face 2am opener
description: England are handed World Cup kick-off times which suit UK audiences - but Scotland fans face later finishes during next summer's tournament.

title: Hasselhoff, Clinton & Blatter v Williams - the 1994 World Cup draw
description: Watch the last USA World Cup draw that was Las Vegas in 1994 featuring famous faces like Robin Williams, Bill Clinton and more.

title: Trump receives inaugural Fifa Peace Prize
description: Watch the moment US president receives the first ever Fifa Peace Prize at the 2026 World Cup draw.

title: Who are the 2026 World Cup debutants?
description: From a tiny Caribbean island to a nation once managed by Harry Redknapp, meet the teams who will be making their debut at the 2026 World Cup.

title: 'Fearless' Northern Ireland learn potential World Cup rivals
description: Northern Ireland will face hosts Canada, Qatar and Switzerland in Group B of the World Cup if they come through March's tricky play-off.

title: Kind draw with an edge? Wales' potential World Cup group
description: If Wales qualify for the World Cup, they will be pleased with a relatively kind draw - and a chance to settle a score with co-hosts Canada.

title: 'Bring it on' says Clarke as Scotland face Brazil, Morocco & Haiti
description: Scotland will open their World Cup finals next summer against Haiti after also being drawn against Brazil and Morocco.

title: President Trump wins inaugural Fifa Peace Prize
description: US President Donald Trump receives the inaugural Fifa Peace Prize before the draw for the 2026 Fifa World Cup.

title: When England thrashed Panama at 2018 World Cup in Russia
description: BBC Sport looks back at England's 6-1 win over Panama in 2018, after the two sides are drawn in the same group for the 2026 World Cup.

title: 'Bring it on' - Clarke reacts to Scotland's World Cup draw
description: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke reacts to being drawn into Group C for the 2026 World Cup alongside Brazil, Morocco and Haiti.

title: Tuchel reacts to England's 'difficult' World Cup group
description: World Cup 2026: Thomas Tuchel reacts to England's 'difficult' group after draw

title: Could one win get Scotland out of World Cup group?
description: BBC Scotland digs into Scotland's World Cup progression prospects.

title: Who are favourites to win the 2026 World Cup?
description: The 2026 World Cup draw has been made which means the countdown to the tournament is on - but who are the favourites to win the coveted trophy?

title: Old and new foes - a look at England's World Cup group
description: BBC Sport profiles Croatia, Panama and Ghana - England's Group L opponents at the 2026 World Cup.

title: Plotting England and Scotland's routes through the World Cup
description: It took a while, but the World Cup draw is finally done and fans of England and Scotland can start to work out their path to glory.

title: England start World Cup against Croatia, Scotland to face Brazil
description: England will begin their World Cup 2026 campaign against Croatia, while Scotland have been drawn in the same group as Brazil for next summer's tournament.

title: Contenders plot path to 2026 World Cup glory after Trump steals show at draw
description: The path to glory at the 2026 World Cup has now been laid out after the contenders discovered their tournament fate at Friday's draw ceremony in Washington which was dominated by Donald Trump.The US President received FIFA's new peace prize on stage at the Kennedy Center prior to the draw for the first 48-team World Cup, which offered kind starts to the tournament for holders Argentina and much-fancied Spain in particular.

title: At the 2026 World Cup draw, the winner is ... Donald Trump
When will England and Scotland find out where they will play World Cup matches?
description: England and Scotland will know their World Cup opponents on Friday, but there will be a wait to discover where they will play.

title: Trump and Infantino - too close for comfort?
description: Fridayâ€™s World Cup draw in Washington DC will be the latest illustration of the ever-closer relationship between US President Donald Trump and Fifa president Gianni Infantino.

title: Springbok Etzebeth banned for 12 weeks over eye gouge
description: South African double World Cup winner Eben Etzebeth is banned until March following his red card for gouging Wales' Alex Mann on Saturday.

title: England World Cup subs might stay indoors - Tuchel
description: England manager Thomas Tuchel says he may have his substitutes stay in the dressing room during matches at the World Cup next summer because of the risks posed by high temperatures.

title: The World Cup draw is here - this is how it will work
description: Pots, quadrants, confederation constraints, group position grids ... the World Cup draw is not going to be straightforward.

title: How many teams are playing at 2026 World Cup? List of nations at expanded soccer tournament
description: More teams than ever before will contest the 24th edition of the FIFA World Cup, which will be staged across the United States, Canada and Mexico in 2026.

title: Canada pot in World Cup draw: Where CanMNT will be selected for 2026 FIFA group stage
description: Canada co-host next year's World Cup, making it the first time such games have ever been staged in the country. Their draw pot will help to determine how tough the schedule might be for Jesse Marsch's side.

title: USA pot in World Cup draw: Where USMNT will be selected for 2026 FIFA group stage
description: As main hosts of the competition, fans of the United States are looking forward to the moment they find out which countries will stand in their way of a potentially historic World Cup run on home soil.

title: England pot in World Cup draw: Where Three Lions will be selected for 2026 FIFA group stage
description: England stormed through qualification for the 2026 FIFA World Cup. That could help Thomas Tuchel's team out at Friday's draw.

title: Mexico pot in World Cup draw: Where El Tri will be selected for 2026 FIFA group stage
description: Mexico will serve as a World Cup host for the third time in its history and this could help El Tri in Friday's group stage draw.

title: Brazil pot in World Cup draw: Where Selecao will be selected for 2026 FIFA group stage
description: The world powerhouse will find out soon.

title: World Cup bracket, explained: How seeds, groups, format will work in expanded 48-team field for 2026 FIFA tournament
description: The 2026 FIFA World Cup promises to be the biggest, and likely most anticipated football tournament ever.

title: Canada World Cup draw 2026: Group results, schedule, roster, coach and more to know
description: Led by Alphonso Davies, Tajon Buchanan and Jonathan David, expectations are sky-high for Canada in 2026.

title: What is the FIFA Peace Prize? Explaining new award at World Cup 2026 draw with Donald Trump rumored winner
description: FIFA announced a new award on Nov. 5. It has very little to do with the sport's on-field product.

title: Ferdinand to conduct World Cup draw with sporting greats
description: Rio Ferdinand will conduct Friday's World Cup draw in Washington DC alongside a host of sporting greats, including Tom Brady, Wayne Gretzky, Aaron Judge and Shaquille O'Neal.

title: England and Wales in same 2027 World Cup group
description: England and Wales are paired up in the pool stages at the 2027 Rugby World Cup, with Scotland and Ireland also drawn together.

title: 'An unbelievable year' - how ready are Lionesses for World Cup qualifiers?
description: England capped off a successful 2025 with resounding victories over China and Ghana at home - so what shape are they in for World Cup qualification?

title: Fifa set to use VAR for corners at World Cup
description: Fifa is set to have VAR checks on the awarding of corner kicks at the World Cup despite domestic leagues rejecting the idea.

title: History-maker Girmay signs for Iniesta's new team
description: History-making African cyclist Biniam Girmay signs for NSN Cycling - the new team co-owned by World Cup winner Andres Iniesta.

title: GB beat Iceland to earn first World Cup qualifying win
description: Great Britain earn their first win of the 2027 Fiba World Cup qualifiers with a 90-82 victory over Iceland.

title: 'My brothers might force me' - Tuilagi on possible Samoa switch
description: Manu Tuilagi, who won 60 caps for England, says he may take up the option of representing Samoa at the 2027 Rugby World Cup.

title: Lithuania stun GB on buzzer in opening World Cup qualifier
description: Lithuania snatch a thrilling 89-88 victory against Great Britain to inflict a painful defeat on the hosts in the opening match of their 2027 Fiba World Cup qualifiers campaign in London.

title: Ronaldo and the World Cup reprieve: special treatment or justified?
description: Has Fifa given Cristiano Ronaldo special treatment to get the star player to the 2026 World Cup finals, or have we seen this happen before?

title: 'I'm ready for my next move' - Dow announces retirement
description: England's World Cup-winning wing Abby Dow announces her retirement from rugby at the age of 28, saying she plans to return to a career in mechanical engineering.

title: 'It would be the biggest middle finger' - Chilwell eyes World Cup
description: Ben Chilwell is keen to show he can go from the Chelsea 'bomb squad' to England's World Cup squad thanks to his move to Strasbourg.

title: England World Cup winner Dow retires aged 28
description: England's World Cup-winning wing Abby Dow announces her retirement from rugby at the age of 28 in order to focus on a career in mechanical engineering.

title: England face debutants Italy at 2026 T20 World Cup
description: England will face tournament debutants Italy at the 2026 Men's T20 World Cup while defending champions India and Pakistan will renew their rivalry in the group stage.

title: Ronaldo clear for World Cup opener despite red card
description: Cristiano Ronaldo will be able to play for Portugal in their opening World Cup game despite his red card against the Republic of Ireland.

title: Fifa to keep top seeds apart in World Cup draw
description: The top four seeded countries will not be able to meet each other until the semi-finals of next year's World Cup for the first time in the tournament's history.

title: Homeless in Abidjan to World Cup hope via Hackney Marshes - rise of QPR's Kone
description: Richard Kone was homeless at 16, playing non-league football fewer than two years ago and now he could be going to the 2026 World Cup.

title: A Grand Slam should be seen as 'stepping stone' - Dawson column
description: In his latest BBC Sport column, England World Cup winner Matt Dawson discusses Steve Borthwick's side's perfect autumn and how the next step will be winning a Grand Slam.

title: Welbeck and Wilson - might old guard make England World Cup squad?
description: Callum Wilson and Danny Welbeck have drifted to the periphery of the international stage in recent years, but that might be about to change.

title: GB clinch two skeleton golds in World Cup opener
description: Great Britain's Matt Weston wins the opening skeleton race of the season on the track that will be used for next year's Winter Olympics, in Cortina, Italy.

title: Israeli cycling team taken over by Iniesta's company
description: The team formerly known as Israel-Premier Tech is taken over by a branding company co-founded by Barcelona legend and World Cup winner Andres Iniesta.

title: Uefa orders Scotland fans to remove celebration videos from X
description: European football's governing body claimed clips of fans cheering Scotland's World Cup qualification in front of TV screens breached copyright.
